and period ended 31st December 2025 and the declaration of first interim dividend for the financial year 2025-26.

data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Hindustan Aeronautics Ltd on February 4 2026 with reference to news appeared in https://www.business-standard.com/ dated February 4 2026 quoting "HAL wont build AMCA; competition between Tata L&T and Kalyani now: Source"

The reply is awaited.

data.caption: Audited Financial Results (Standalone And Consolidated) For The Quarter And Half Year Ended 30Th September, 2022 And Declaration Of First Interim Dividend
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today has, inter-alia, approved the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and half-year ended 30th September, 2022.
Further, the Board of Directors of the Company has declared first interim dividend of Rs. 20/- per equity share of Rs. 10/- each fully paid up (200%) for the Financial Year 2022-23.

The Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today has, inter-alia, approved the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and period ended 31st December, 2021.
Further, the Board of Directors of the Company has declared second interim dividend of Rs. 26/- per equity share of Rs. 10/- each fully paid up (260%) for the Financial Year 2021-22.
